name: Dice Defender (RetroCoder)
description:
IF YOU HAVE COOKIES DISABLED, THE GAME MAY NOT RUN OR MAY NOT SAVE YOUR PROGRESS

You roll a dice to decide what attack you will do
Kill all the enemies and protect the dice.
Depending on what values you roll, your attacks can be more or less powerful
The higher or lower number you get, the more powerful your attack is:

Fireball25HP2 or 12 is rolledFlamethrower
15HP3 or 11 is rolledExplosives10HP4 or 10 is rolledSword5HP5 or 9 is rolledLaser2HP6, 7 or 8 is rolled

The enemies range from Low to Extreme:

LowMedium
HighExtreme

WASD to move
Click or Space to roll the dice
Aim with  
M to mute
Escape to return to the menu

Made in JavaScript. No engine used

Art and Sound by illusifox and Zaperno
